tool_description: Detect nudity, inappropriate, unwanted, or offensive content in images.
name: Moderately
title: Moderately

api_list.name: Image
api_list.description:
Send in an image URL and get a list of inappropriate, unwanted, or offensive labels detected for the uploaded image.
If no inappropriate content is detected in the image, the response is an empty list.
Works for images up of size up to 5MB

Properties scanned for:
- Explicit Nudity
- Suggestive (i.e. partial nudity)
- Violence
- Visually Disturbing
- Rude Gestures
- Drugs
- Tobacco
- Alcohol
- Gambling
- Hate Symbols

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: URL of the image to get moderation lables for. Supported formats: JPEG and PNG
